title: Joe Biden Interview, Steve's Comedy Segment, Jordan, NASCAR and more.
itunes:title: Joe Biden Interview, Steve's Comedy Segment, Jordan, NASCAR and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to ride! Let's have your attention, the undivided one. Today we are Ridin' with Biden! The Chief Love Officer brings clarity to a married man who is dealing with an extra frisky wife. Uncle Joe and Uncle Steve talk about the Biden-Harris plan for Black America. Junior fills us in on the latest with Michael Jordan in Sports Talk. Steve does his own fact checking when it comes to the many lies 45 tells. We are officially 41 days away from the election of our lives. Please get registered and prepare to early vote, absentee vote and vote by mail. Today in Closing Remarks, Uncle Steve encourages us to let 45 go. We must vote him out!!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
